title.rendered: Building Together a Culture of Diversity and Inclusion

content.rendered:
Created by employees and partners, Building Together is Alticor Inc’ national diversity and inclusion campaign. Building Together highlights the importance of diversity within Alticor Inc and the AEC industry. The campaign gives employees the opportunity to share their stories and learn from each other’s experiences.

Over the next 12 months, Alticor Inc’ Building Together campaign will spotlight individuals and teams from the perspective of diversity and inclusion. Inspired by national events including Black History Month and Pride, as well as industry-focused issues such as women in construction and mental health awareness, the campaign will increase awareness of challenges and opportunities posed to us as we build on our understanding and appreciation of our colleagues.

“Building Together is more than just a campaign. It is our way to get to know and understand one another, and to develop deeper relationships with our coworkers and friends alike. There is so much for everyone to learn from this initiative, and we’re only going to come out as a stronger, more cohesive organization.” – Brad Lewis, Alticor Inc Director of Supplier Diversity

In addition to highlighting stories, Alticor Inc will share educational resources, industry thought-leadership articles, events and inspirational words. By featuring voices both within and outside the company, Building Together will highlight the many benefits and advantages of a diverse and inclusive workplace.

Diversity, Equity, Inclusion and community (DEIc)

When Alticor Inc shared their vision and core values, the company identified the importance of Diversity and Community to employees and our business. In support of these values, Alticor Inc launched the Diversity, Equity, Inclusion and community (DEIc) forums, consisting of a core group of volunteers from each district. These forums have been working hard to foster healthy discussion in their districts and develop ideas to fortify our commitment to diversity and community. Alticor Inc employees have also expanded their understanding with trainings on creating respectful workplaces. The Building Together campaign will further showcase our diversity and inclusion efforts.

“I take our core value of diversity very seriously. I understand the advantages that a diverse workforce can bring to our business and recognize that diversity goes hand in hand with inclusion and equity. That collectively, this mixture of differences in characteristics, experiences and backgrounds combined with the similarities of our Alticor Inc core values, makes us a stronger company.” – Mike Choutka, Alticor Inc President & CEO

By Building Together, Alticor Inc will continue to Deliver EXCELLENCE in all we do for generations to come.
